_header: All hail Lady Mother and Virgin immaculate
Subjects: Virgin Mary, songs in honour of
_description: On the Angelic Salutation — four stanzas rhyme royal

BLAdd20059.First Lines:
All haile lady mother & virgyn immaculateHaile mary most
                    precious that bare our savyour Ihesu…
BLAdd20059.Last Lines:
…Wherefore dere lady solistrice be for graceThat we with thy
                    son in heyven may haue a place
BLAdd20059.Note:
Nineteenth-century transcript by Hunter in London,  British Library Addit. 24542,
                        f.179v.

Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
